name: Circle Match (Liam Donlan)
description:
- This game was made in under three hours for the Tri-Jam (three hour game jam.

- To score points you must match the red circle to the grey circle by transforming the red circle.

- You can scale up the red circle with X and you can scale down the red circle with Z

- You can translate (move) the red circle with the arrow keys

- To restart press ESC then select "reset cart"
